member.summary: Releases all resources held by the object.

member.returns: A proxy that wraps the instance.

member.summary: Defines an interception wrapper that can convert a Castle DynamicProxy2 into a Ninject for interception.

member.name: T:Ninject.Integration.DynamicProxy2.DynamicProxy2Module
member.summary: Extends the functionality of the kernel, providing a proxy factory that uses LinFu to generate dynamic proxies.
